Work

Dieter Rams Book

I designed this simple book covering the infamous designer's "10 Principles For Good Design" while in graduate school.

I used a simple grid system based on the dimensions of the Braun T3 Pocket Radio - the product known for influencing the design of Apple’s iPod. The products showcased in the book span Dieter’s work for both Braun and Vitsoe.
